channel.title: No-ip Help!
channel.description:
Hey i need help with making an no-ip server! I have an router, and i use no.ip.com! Can any1 help me forward till other players can play in my server?
Grtz Mike!

item.title: No-ip Help!
item.dc:creator: @Marubinu Marubinu
item.description:
@Marubinu wrote:

Ok… But can some1 try to log in on marubinupk.no-ip.biz/ 82.156.240.230?

Read full topic

item.title: No-ip Help!
item.dc:creator: @vraj82192 vraj82192
item.description:
@vraj82192 wrote:

The port for a server, depends on which source your using and wether or not you changed it.

When you runserver, it should give you like 0.0.0.043594 or 5555 at the end. And thats your servers port.

To log in (for you only), you go to file, new port > 5555 or 43594 then use the defult IPIt works for you only.

If you want OTHER people to get on your server, then either set up a Hamachi network, or a No-Ip with the info you can find in the tut section.

Read full topic

item.title: No-ip Help!
item.dc:creator: @Marubinu Marubinu
item.description:
@Marubinu wrote:

So, Okay i have made a servername “marubinupk.no-ip.biz”. And now ill need to click runserver.bat and log in Moparscape on 127.0.0.1? Than the other players log in with marubinupk.no-ip.biz to come into my server?[br][size=1]Posted on: March 12, 2007, 12:54:55 PM[/size][hr]Wtf how can this!!!

  1. I have made a ip: “marubinupk.no-ip.info”.
  2. I click runserver.
  3. I Click startserver on Moparscape.
  4. Ill try to log in on “marubinupk.no-ip.info”.
  5. Than he says Error Connecting server?

BTW I using Fr33sc4p3!

Read full topic

item.title: No-ip Help!
item.dc:creator: @crazyboi50 crazyboi50
item.description:
@crazyboi50 wrote:

i have seen peeps asking how to make a no-ip so here is my guild (im makeing for some rep) and i like to help
ok i have a no-ip and it took like 2 mins to make here is is if u have problems just post onnthis or pm me in fourms my msn is adam_roberts_66@hotmail.co.uk ok here we go

step 1 go to www.no-ip.com

step 2 make a emails adress and log in on www.no-ip.com

step 3 go to the left side it says add

step 4 go on add and like add ur server name like exsampel (ploxscape) then go on the list for like .no-ip.info
.no-ip.org
no-ip.biz ect.

step 5 go to host at the bottem of the page it should say it will take 5 min to make it
then try it also when u log in u get ur ip aswel like eg(5.68.554.7) like that

step 6 log in with ur no-ip

step 7 pm if it worked and pm if ur stuck

hope i help u guy thank you… crazyboi50

           thanks for looking

Read full topic

item.title: No-ip Help!
item.dc:creator: @vraj82192 vraj82192
item.description:
@vraj82192 wrote:

You don’t need to pay to get do Port Forwarding.

Go look in the tut section, it tells you how to do port forward if your behind a router, there is a full pic tut. Except it wasn’t much help to me since I use a linksys router at home. And that guy that had the pic tut for port forwarding used a different one.

Go to www.no-ip.com and set up a No-Ip account and make a domain for it.

Read full topic
